Reviews.Review: Top IRC App. Ũbersichtlich und schnell.
Great app to connect to my favourite channel (PowerShell) on chat.eu.freenode.net.
Works really good. Hope they add a background agent so I stay logged in when minimizing. :)
Very good. I think this is just about as good as an IRC client can be on a phone, and now it event has support for secure connections!
Very short trial almost put me off but works great. Desperately needed well done creators.

Features.Feature: If you know the basics of IRC chat (Internet Relay Chat), you can get started in few seconds. Chat with thousands of other IRC users with this Windows Phone IRC client.
With this Windows Phone IRC application you’re not limited to only one server. Want to connect to both the QuakeNet and the IRCNet, simultaneously? IRC7 can do that for you.
Don't miss important messages. Your nick is always highlighted and you can open links directly from the chat window.
Op, kick and send private messages from a easy-to-use user management window.
Even though this IRC client is rich with features, it doesn't stress your phone.
IRC7 defaults to UTF-8 encoding. This works in most of the situations, but if this IRC app notices problems with someone’s messages, it automatically reverts to ISO 8859-1.
The only Windows Phone IRC application available which supports SSL. Also SASL is supported, making this IRC client very secure
Startup scripts and custom aliases. Custom aliases can be created with a smart scripting syntax.
IRC7 is already rich with features. But it will get better and better. If you have an idea of how to make the app even better, share it with others through the UserVoice. irc7.uservoice.com
